Entries.AlexPostBath/f Alex 750/t 1700 2400: continue/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 2 Alex 18 58 3 Figure -2000 -2000 0/skippable/pause 1500/message "As you finish getting ready to exit the bathhouse, you can't help but wonder who that figure was...#Why'd they have to ruin your day like that..."/viewport 15 52 true/pause 1000/move Alex -5 0 3 true/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 10 57/pause 200/advancedMove farmer false 0 1 1 0/pause 1000/stopAdvancedMoves/stopAnimation farmer/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 400/waitForAllStationary/speak Alex "What's wrong with you?$9#$b#Actually, I don't care.#$b#Now, if you'll excuse me, I have a few laps to swim."/pause 200/move Alex -1 0 3/emote farmer 16/pause 400/speak Alex "Ugh, what is it?$a"/pause 200/quickQuestion #Ask him to walk you home.#'Never mind.'(break)message "You hear him let out a huff of annoyance."\pause 200\speak Alex "Why'd I have to choose today of all days to come here...$a#$b#Fine, let's go.$9"\addMailReceived walkHomeMail\fork walkHomeMail walkHome(break)message "You hear him groan in annoyance.\pause 200\speak Alex "Well don't hold me up for no reason then.$a#$b#Come on, spit it out, what do you want?$9#$b#You clearly look shaken up about something.$9"\addMailReceived neverMindMail\fork neverMindMail neverMindQuestion
Entries.neverMindQuestion: pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 400/quickQuestion #Tell him about the figure.#'Just leave me alone.'(break)message "Alex's jaw clenches in annoyance."\pause 200\speak Alex "Let me walk you home. I'm not taking 'no' for an answer.$9"\addMailReceived changedHomeMind\fork changedHomeMind walkHome(break)speak Alex "Fine, guess I won't offer you help anymore.$a"\pause 200\pause 400\advancedMove Alex false -2 0 0 -3\pause 1400\stopAdvancedMoves\playSound doorClose\warp Alex -2000 -2000\pause 500\emote farmer 28\pause 200\globalFade\viewport -1000 -1000\end
Entries.walkHome: pause 200/faceDirection Alex 1/move Alex 5 0 1 farmer 5 0 1 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Alex 3/waitForAllStationary/changeLocation BusStop/warp farmer 21 23/warp Alex 23 23/viewport 24 20/pause 1200/emote Alex 40/pause 400/speak Alex "There, feel safe now?$9#$b#Can I go back?$9"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 400/faceDirection Alex 1/pause 200/emote Alex 12/pause 400/speak Alex "By the way, make sure you lock your doors tonight...$a"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 400/speak Alex "Don't get it twisted, I don't care about you, just...$5#$b#Make sure you lock them.$9"/pause 200/move Alex 15 0 1 true/emote farmer 8/pause 400/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/speak Alex "You're really making this difficult for me, y'know.$a#$b#I'm not gonna sit back while you terrorize them, cut it out.$a"/pause 200/speak Figure "Oh come on, Alex.#$b#Where's the fun in that?"/pause 500/end newDay
